org.jcvlib.io

Class WebCamReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.io.WebCamReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, VideoReader

    public class WebCamReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements VideoReader, java.lang.Runnable
    This class allow get images from web-cameras.

    Example of usage: 

     ...
 int numberOfWebCam = 0; // First web-camera.
 int FPS = 30;
 Size sizeOfGettingImage = new Size(320, 240);
 // Initialize web-camera.
 WebCamReader webCam = new WebCamReader(numberOfWebCam, FPS, sizeOfGettingImage);
 ...
 Image image = null;
 webCam.open();
 if (webCam.isOpen()) {
      image = webCam.getImage();
      ...
 }
 ...
 webCam.close();
 ...

    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WebCamReader()
      Open first web-camera (number 0) with 30 FPS and 320x240 picture size.
      WebCamReader(int numWebCam)
      Open web-camera with 30 FPS and 320x240 picture size.
      WebCamReader(int numWebCam, int FPS, Size sizeOfImage)
      Open web-camera with defined web-camera number, FPS and size of getting image.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close current device and stop reading data from it.
      Image getImage()
      Get current image from web-camera.
      Size getSize()
      Return size of image that get from web-camera.
      boolean isOpen()
      Check if current device is opened.
      void open()
      Open current device.
      void run()
      Run thread to read data from web-camera.
